text: Implement form-based code requiring pedestrian-oriented design in all commercial districts.
name: p1

text: Mandate all businesses with over $1M revenue to achieve 30% emissions reduction within 5 years.
name: p2

text: Maintain current health monitoring systems with equal attention to traditional and climate-related health risks.
name: p3

text: Allow optional sustainability sections in business license applications without affecting approval decisions.
name: p4

text: Maintain current mix of traditional and green business support services with equal funding.
name: p5

text: Create public dashboard tracking urban ecosystem health indicators city-wide.
name: p6

text: Implement waste tracking systems in all municipal buildings with monthly reporting.
name: p7

text: Record monthly water consumption data without implementing any conservation measures.
name: p8

text: Create public dashboards showing real-time air quality and heat index data across the city.
name: p9

text: Conduct basic climate vulnerability assessments with voluntary adaptation guidelines.
name: p10

text: Cap recycling program funding at 10% of waste management budget regardless of diversion potential.
name: p11

text: Consider both compact and traditional development patterns equally in zoning decisions.
name: p12

text: Install energy monitoring displays in public buildings without consumption reduction targets.
name: p13

text: Implement comprehensive flood early warning system with automated alerts and evacuation protocols.
name: p14

text: Require minimum residential density of 15 units per acre within quarter-mile of transit stations.
name: p15

text: Cap disaster preparedness budgets at current levels with explicit exclusion of climate adaptation measures.
name: p16

text: Consider both historical data and climate projections equally in hazard planning.
name: p17

text: Restrict leak detection activities to visible surface water only, prohibiting proactive infrastructure monitoring.
name: p18

text: Monitor municipal energy consumption patterns without implementing any efficiency measures.
name: p19

text: Document extreme weather events without implementing any climate adaptation strategies.
name: p20

text: Require all municipal facilities to achieve 50% waste diversion through recycling and composting.
name: p21

text: Allow optional energy efficiency upgrades only during already planned renovations.
name: p22

text: Mandate all new municipal facilities to include minimum 50kW renewable generation capacity.
name: p23

text: Cap renewable energy installations at 5% of municipal power consumption and prohibit energy storage systems.
name: p24

text: Conduct basic biodiversity surveys in public parks with voluntary conservation guidelines.
name: p25
